title: i cant connect to 2.4 ghz wifi cos my pixel xl only support 5.0 ghz can i force to conect to 2.4 ghz
content:
if sameone can advice me something it ll be great please help me becose in my country 99% of routers are working on 2.4 ghz i cant conect to wifi which is 2.4 ghz it only connect on 5.0 ghz ! please help me !
thanks in advance <3
